Theres 1 bug i encountered where when you die you have the option to continue from the dag before you died and i tapped on yes but i continued on the day i died (i go out on day 14 and then night comes day 15 game over and the continue is day 15 the it crashes the game ) please fix this
Not worth the price at ALL
Can i ask for a refund of it? The game is good but it annoys me every time it crashes. This happened all the time after the character died and I can't again starting before the day it happened.
Fun but gets boring pretty quick once you understand the stuff
not quite as good as the others. shorter and no chance for a happy ending
Amazing. Just like the original. Just wish they would add new stories already !!
Fk ur permission
All the people saying it's too hard or the merchants are too greedy are just bad at the game and probably haven't played more than 5 minutes of the story.
4 hours game!
at first it force closes but after I reboot my phone it works
Fab follow on game. Please make more!!

Just like the original the only draw back 1 story line This war of mine is an excellent app those of us who love the original find this one easy to play. It needs more of everything don't understand why it was released as a single I still play the original Looking forward to a newer version this one is not for beginners of This War of Mine I paid for the originals worth every penny I keep this one because of the original
The Best
Masterpiece. Made by artists, not programmers.
Endless die loop have to restart facepalm

Please help! The game doesn't let me continue, after I died on day 17 it ask if I would like to start from the previous day, I press yes and it just loops. I keep getting "day 17" and "Adam died scavenging." After awhile it just kicks me off the game and makes me reboot the game.

I'm sure the story is good you'll just be hard pressed to read any of it, the merchants are as greedy as it gets, trade everything and its still not enough, i can't stay alive long enough to find food for myself, and it seems like you have to wait the next day just to go somewhere, waste of time. Definitely a game I would love to play if it was a little more intuitive.

The game is nice the problem is that at the beginning when i have to trade materials for meds for the daughter. i have traded everything and nothing was enough for the merchant to accept trade. When i searched it from walkthroughs from other players, it only took a few items to trade a medicine for, which i cannot do. I hate it when i get a bad ending from an unfair situation. I like the game mechanics but this bugs sets me off
Very short and easy if you have already finished original This War of Mine. Needs more content.
üëåüëåüëå
More great content, but it is a very short scenario. Grab it if you love the original and can accept the short game with a good storyline.

Absolutely brilliant game with a shocking twist at the end. I thoroughly enjoyed playing this. It took me a few attempts to learn what everything does but once I got to grips with it I was hooked. The story is gripping and keeps you searching to find the truth and surviving alone is extremely hard so plan everything carefully. Amazing game I highly recommend you download this.

I was hoping for atleast a little more to a story than that.. it was an amazing playthrough. I really felt like I was in a story and not just trying to survive. It made the experience feel a little more alive.
Not bad but it would have been nice to have more then 23 days accomplish your mission.
OMG the ending really made me sad you made this game unexpectedly good keep this up and continue to made game like this maybe a zombie war IDK hope more of this game came out
Realistic, emotional gameplay. Beautiful art style.
Makes you think
Good game from what i saw, i did not complete it but i still enjoyed it.

WORSE THAN BASE GAME Story:Though I admit the ending is more shocking than expected,but all the dialogues and notes are nothing more than five minutes,so the story aren't long.And the game has no multiple endings(WTH!?) Gameplay:This game is much shorter than the base game,about10-14game days,compare to the 45 game days in the base game, so a lot of the crafting is excessive and awakard,you don't need Heater,distiller,defence and you have one character only,so the human management is missing too

Very disappointed in how short the game play is, considering i payed just under 3 pound for this?! I loved the first game but this story is just that.... A story. Making your house is pointless because once you 'save' the child thats it....... Bullsh*#!!! Refund would be nice but apparently it isnt supported?!?!
Great game worth the money
Hard to figure out as a beginner

The story was super amazing with the unexpected plot twist. Its even more harder than the original as you only got one guy and you cannot guard the shelter often, making it more challenging makes it more fun. I honestly liked it more than the original. Whoever the rated this game poorly just because the story is short or they don't understand the lore of the game or the reason why you cannot explore in the daytime is stupid. Don't listen to them. Short but so what? Quality matters more!
Great story! It kept me on edge the whole time. I love how this is set up as more than just survival. It felt like an actual console video game.
Good story, but you are better off just watching it on Youtube. The story and gameplay is short.

Played the original, loved that. This one is a singular short story (game days, about 21- finished in real life in about 3 sittings but could easily complete start to finish in 1). If you liked the original, you'll enjoy it. Free with Google Pass, but I'd have been content paying the $3 for it.
Would be great, if it wasn't absolutely linear and too short.

I did not figure out how to control the game, my gamepad was not helpful...I dont know why but the game seemed unresponsive to my gamepad and only did a very few things I clicked on with my mouse and screen... I got bored and gave up on it.
Even though this is the only special story for This War of Mine, it's definitely the best story-line of the whole game(s), highly recommend both games, can't wait for the next story!
Decent story and gameplay however if i had paid the actual 3 bucks I'd be disappointed for how short it was, little more than an hour. Luckily it was a part of the google pass, so i got to enjoy it.
Better improvements than previous but really to short. Very short..

It's a great concept, great game, but making people pay $2, than only having 1 story to where you can only last 30 days if you dont find your kid, or 10 if you find out what happened. Ridiculous, I wish I could get a refund. I was really looking forward to it because the last game was amazing.

Absolute waste of money. A single short story. If you dont focus on the story the war will end before you finish the objective, that leaves you to focus only on the objective, while working on your safe house is pointless and an absolute waste of time, considering you will keep getting robbed and a fk loads of your stuff will get stolen. You dont get any new characters or stories for finishing the story either. Dont waste your money, if you're curious just go ahead and watch it on youtube.
Love this game ‚ù§Ô∏è
Do not erase my review
Some new maps. Less then 2 week story.

Honestly? Kind of lazy compared to the incredidible original game. I get that this is essentially a story mode but there are no other endings except the one everyone gets, which (spolier alert) is always a bad one. No replay value what so ever. I get that they were trying to incorporate PTSD and mental illness that goes along side being in war, but I definitely think there were better ways to do it than a one size fits all ending. Graphics and new locations were cool, though.
Good but needs more content. A single scenario has limited replay value compared to the original game.
It would have been better if the trader came more than once but overall good game

Great game that inherits all of the great aspects of the original game. I would love to give 5 stars for this expansion (like I did for the original game); however, the final story archievement cannot be unlocked, which is why I have to substract one point.

Good game, but the man keeps glitching. He just stands there and won't move. No matter how many times I tell him to. I have to restart the day to get him to respond. Absolutely irritating. If it carries on I'll ask for a refund.

'Father's Promise' absolutely the amazing stories in 'This War Of Mine' And i know that there are another 2 stories named 'The Last Broadcast' and 'Fading Embers' I hoping that 2 stories will be update in mobile version I really want it!

Game is laggy. Not much choice to experiment with graphics. Graphic setting is very limited. It is buggy on mid range phones. For such a price they should atleast listen and optimise the game for all device range. The game is not required to be graphic intensive but still it lags. I hope they do something about it or else it is just a money grab in the name of WAR !
Too short
Short but quite good. Story has some twist but if you are hardcore in books and movies, nothing special. Get it if it is discount
Could be a good game but ending is always sad. I am fan of their games and I see lots of effort, but seems child dies no matter how hard you try, as a father myself I see it too sad
Partially in spirit of the original game, but rather short and due to the script, the actions/concequences do not really matter that much. Still worth playing it.

Overall.. it's masterpiece game, and guess what 11 bit studios you did it again same like the first game come..i know people always told that the price it's to expensive but u give them a masterpiece..but u have something that u need to fix to bro...u see this game the twom father promised its just one story maybe u can give more story,i know what u think "why u what another story..", "didn't u see the title" i know.. but u need to give more story but still in the concept but different storyline.

I think this version of the game can be boring if you don't have kids, and it's also really short. If you do, it will make you feel powerless, then it awakens your dark part to save your loved ones. This is an amazing game to empathize and think on what happens during wars from a totally different perspective. Thank you for this game.
This game is so deep and the story is well told I really love this game ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Combat doesn't work on Android TV, also much of the game is pointless as if you stick to the main goal of searching for your daughter then building and scavenging is just not needed. I collected heaps of stuff and could have built up a storm but by day 10 had found my dead daughter.... game over!
Is that it?? A very short and slow story. And it turns out he had amnesia anyway. Really feel a bit cheated out of my money, the game is choppy as hell, TWoM is great but this...no.
So laggy
I love this game. But it just sucks about how short it is but i love new areas i love these areas in the orignal TWOM.

While TWOM is among the best games I've ever played, it doesn't lend itself to a scripted storytelling experience. Part of the problem is that each standard game tells a much more compelling and diverse 'story' anyway, one which you write yourself through the actions you assign your survivors. This expansion succeeds in providing some interesting locations and tries to do something different, but the limited execution does not match the ambition.
Good story!
... Can't clear the 4th achievement, (learn the truth). Fix it please. And "write my very own story"
When is the next story being added?
It's awesome to play
To bad , you can finish the game easily. Good story but short game play. It is much better if it was merge to the original TWOM.. thats all.. but love the game..
when THE LAST BROADCAST be available for Android??
I love this game

This version is a lot more story driven as opposed to the somewhat dynamic nature of gameplay in the main TWoM. Replaying the game (mid-game) ends up with exactly the same story given its plotline. Should have at least kept the slavic names. The western sounding names doesn't feel right. Intriguing but not exactly for endless hours of gaming. I uninstalled after completing twice. I feel a bit disappointed but I dont regret buying it either.
For a dollar? Yes, wholeheartedly yes.
Very good game need more games like that.
Excellent.
Thx
Finally! another story from one of my favorite game! I can't wait for the other stories like 'the last broadcast' and the cinder thingy! I hope you add them soon.
Amazing game, ported to the mobile well. highly recommend!
It's a great game, I played TWOM several times and this has a rely great storyline. It makes you understand what is a war and how people coop up with it. Touching..

this is a good game and there is 3 ending sad ending happy ending and death ending so i play all 3 of them and and yea its a great game ever^^
great game , do keep making more of this game all the way with some storytelling in future add ons ....love em all
need 60fps, the graphics can be a bit better like the PC version
Game mechanics are severely flawed. There is no way to travel during the day. For even the smallest travels, you have to end the day.

really is a good game, what makes it loose all the points is that is so short. i finished the first story in less than 2 hours and then discovered there is nothing else to the game. no replay value whatsoever since that story is not long enough to try different routes. this should be a dlc or include more stories to be worth it
A great short story in the style of the original game.
ridiculously short story. no replay value.
nice game
PS4 version is just as good
The speed of the game should be fixed, it should be smoother.
keeps lagging and hanging. please refund My amount
why just 1 story. i need more stories.:(
The story was good and plot twists in the end. Wow i love the story itself and how it was tell. Good job 11 bit studios. Now i feel like you must release the last brodcast please. I cant wait.
it is ok at first but you dont have much choice like the og game, its limited to 1 story and nothing different... i was expecting a bit more üòï
good

only problem it seems to lock up at times, thus wasting time
It lags quite a lot and the character often stops moving, so it forces us to leave the game and restart the day to progress, but it happens almost everytime.
fan of this game .... i just wanna install this game again and just see this new this war or mine the graphics is great when i watch the teaser i will pay now i hope .... it will worth....

nice plot, but the story is to short.. don't expect a full survival game like the main one.. for the developer team, please make a This War of Mine sequel.. i loved the first one, n i've been playing it for hundreds of hour now.. a masterpice.. best of luck to you guys.

I do not know how to review this game. My phone is fairly powerful, but this game runs like slide show. Frame rate is unacceptable for my device, may be they not support Kirin chipset, and im too late to do a refund due to latest policy. (Honor view 10)

this wasn't as good as the original... it's add on content... but it forced me into the outcome which i did not like. i know the creators are trying to get the point across but i think it could have been one of the possible endings. i am still playing the original to this day. you guys should adapt this to apocalyptic world n make it into new game. i would pay to play!
it's ok but the war over 2 fast

At first, I thought there're some of stories here, with different characters. But nope, only one story and a bit short. And on this version, you only controling one character, when he sleeps, you don't know what to do. Much better if there're some characters like the original version. But this game worth to try.
just the best game 2019

That is short story and got the bad ending ever.
great adventure but bad ending.. I hate this ending! btw. its too short.
Story is way too short. Close to enjoyment but not enough. Disappointing...

Want to take an amazing game like "This War of Mine," which has endless replay value, resulting in hundreds of hours of gameplay, and make it suck eggs? Then this stupid standalone DLC is for you. Seriously disappointed. 2-3 hours for completion, after which you have no incentive to play again because the story, characters and locations aren't dynamic.
Able to fix the lag. Not as smooth as TWOM. Can incorporate into TWOM rather than an individual app. No sure the new one able to tap on the TWOM resources to make the app size smaller. Thanks.
